name: Firefox Push Notification - Orange and Black
description:
Innnnconceivable presents a customization for Firefox push notification popups that is orange text with black background.  Title centered and image shrinkd to reduce size of that annoying, huge white box.  

3 second countdown till window closes.

user.name: Andy Dodds (Innnnconceivable)
user.about: Tech support guy working in this crappy world trying to support a family.
